name: Psyche Out
description:
Psyche and Delia have had enough. Too many experiments and not enough time to unwind means that their psychic powers are very strong, but their lust for freedom is even stronger. 

In this short puzzle game, you'll take charge of both Psyche and Delia, working together to reach the exit of the maze-like laboratory they call home. 

You might find that sometimes, it's better to go it alone...

Created for the #gmtkjam 2021

Theme: Joined Together

Made by ChrisDeeBrown and meghan0n.
